entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
